csrAuthentication.userNotAllowedWebUi: This user does not have access to Web UI. Users with a primary staff type of driver cannot access Web UI.

searchkeyword.acc: ACC - Search based on AR Account code
searchkeyword.bcn: BCN - Search based on barcode number
searchkeyword.con: CON - Search based on container serial number and tag number
searchkeyword.fed: FED - Search based on Federal ID
searchkeyword.inv: INV - Search based on customer invoice numbers

placeholder.con: Enter Container Serial Number / Tag Number (Minimum 3 Characters)
placeholder.mat: Enter Matrikkelnummer in format Knr-Gnr/Bnr/Fnr/Snr  (Minimum 3 Characters)
placeholder.ppc: Enter Pre Pay Card Number (Minimum 3 Characters)
placeholder.rpt: Enter Report Name, Description, or Keywords (Minimum 3 Characters)

searchkeyword.pon: PON - Search based on purchase order number
searchkeyword.ppc: PPC - Search based on customer pre pay card numbers
searchkeyword.rpt: RPT - Search based on report name, description, or keywords
searchkeyword.son: OON - Search based on outbound order number
searchkeyword.stn: STN - Search based on scale ticket number
searchkeyword.tna: TNA - Search based on trading name
searchkeyword.wdn: WDN - Search based on waste declaration numbers
